Performer:
Tsuruzawa Seishirō (鶴澤清志郎)

Dates: '1994/04-'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


Performances as Shamisen Player:

August 1994: Pilgrimage to the West

September 1994: The White Fox of Shinoda

November 1994: The League of the 47 Ronin

December 1994: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

January 1995: The Celebration of Housing Starts

April 1995: The Subscription List

April 1995: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees

May 1995: The New Barrier of Ataka

August 1995: The Story of Manda Ponds

August 1995: Gonza the Lancer

September 1995: Kiichi's Book of Strategy

January 1996: The Mask Peddler

April 1996: The Cherry Trees Along the Hidaka River

April 1996: The White Fox of Shinoda

July 1996: Sasayaki no take
